Description: Pre-owned In Mint ConditionEpiphone Limited Edition 2015 Joe Bonamassa Les Paul Standard with Bigsby OutfitBody: Solid Body, Single Cutaway, Mpl Carved Top, Mah Body, Gloss Finish Neck/Fingerboard: Rounded D Profile; 1959 Shape, Mah Neck 24.75" Scale Length, RWD Fretboard, 22 Frets, Hardware/Electronics: Neck Pickup Burstbucker 2, Bridge Pickup Burstbucker 3, Fixed Tune-O-Matic Bridge, Stopbar Tailpiece, Grover Rotomatic Tuning Machines, Chrome Hardware Cosmetic Condition: This guitar is in mint condition. Playability: The neck is very straight, the strings are nice and low, play great, and ring out clearly across the board. All components are in excellent working order. This guitar will not disappoint from the beginner to the advanced shredder. This is a real Les Paul feeling guitar!
